subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kentucky’s Randolph Morris had 19 points and 11 rebounds. Villanova’s Scottie Reynolds kept his team close with 23 points, but had little offensive support from his cold-shooting teammates.
snippet: Kentucky’s Randolph Morris had 19 points and 11 rebounds. Villanova’s Scottie Reynolds kept his team close with 23 points, but had little offensive support from his cold-shooting teammates.
